name: Scratchpad - Vibrant Ink Theme
description:
A theme for Firefox Scratchpad, colors takes from Ace (http://ace.ajax.org/build/kitchen-sink.html)

Preview: http://localhostr.com/files/xnQgH3W/Scratchpad.png

If your scratchpad looks natively like this:
http://localhostr.com/files/ocycerl/ScratchpadNative.png
then you can use this theme.
